Source Url: 
* https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676

Changelog: 
* Moved to /Assets/3rdParty/

Note:
* This package is not offered in the Unity Package manager yet
* There is a known issue MANUALLY adding it into any custom Unity Packages. See (https://github.com/Demigiant/dotween/issues/251)
* So for now I include it in the project
